Namespace FinSysPlatform.Domain.Graphics

Classes

DashStyleExtensions

Extension methods for DashStyle

Fill

Describes the properties of Fill: color, opacity

FillExtensions

Extension methods for Fill

Font

Defines a particular font configuration.

GradientStop

Describes the location and color of a transition point in a gradient.

PointExtensions

Extension method for Point

Stroke

Describes the properties of the stroke (pen): Color, width, pattern

StrokeExtensions

Extension methods for Stroke

Structs

Point

Point - Defaults to 0,0

Rect

Rect - The primitive which represents a rectangle. Rects are stored as X, Y (Location) and Width and Height (Size). As a result, Rects cannot have negative Width or Height.

Size

Size - A value type which defined a size in terms of non-negative width and height

Vector

Vector - A value type which defined a vector in terms of X and Y

Enums

DashStyle

Predefined dash styles See also https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.windows.shapes.shape.strokedasharray for details

Font.FontStyle

Style of the font

Font.FontWeight

Font weight

GradientBrushType

Type of the gradient

HorizontalDirection

Horizontal direction of element

HorizontalOrigin

Defines the horizontal side of of the object which is considered as a start point for placing/drawing For example, for text, if the horizontal origin = left, then it will be drawn to right of the specified point, abd vice versa, for origin = right the text will be drawn to left to the specified point

VerticalDirection

Vertical direction of element

VerticalOrigin

Defines the vertical side of of the object which is considered as a start point for placing/drawing For example, for text, if the vertical origin = bottom, then it will be drawn above the specified point, and vice versa, for origin = top the text will be drawn below the specified point
